meanings.definition: In a manner occurring beneath a glacier or ice sheet.
meanings.sent1: The water flowed subglacially under the massive glacier.
meanings.sent2: The researchers studied how the ice melted subglacially.
meanings.sent3: The penguins subglacially danced on the icy floor.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move subglacially as they explored the frozen cave.
meanings.sent5: The sound echoed subglacially in the icy cavern, creating an eerie atmosphere.
